name: Paul Pruett
description: In the consumer health / wellness space there is no firm with better historic perspective, strategic insights and personal relationships than PCG

name: Ryan Black
description: PCG's industry knowledge and team has added value to our business each and every year

name: Chuck Runyon
description: PCG's early investment has helped SEB accelerate our U.S. and global expansion, capitalizing on the company's robust growth rate and global consumer interest in fitness / health clubs

name: Michael Landau
description: The process prior to bringing PCG on board was daunting and intimidating which changed 180 degrees after they took the helm, managed the process and secured multiple excellent partners to choose from

name: Ric Scalzo
description: TBL and PCG under the leadership of Brent Knudsen have truly been a partner to develop real value for our company

name: Ahmed Rahim
description: PCG has provided Numi with good insights into the marketplace, opportunities for strategic partnerships and overall industry awareness, both for organizational and board growth

name: Simon Goode
description: We appreciate PCG's counsel and support. Their broad industry knowledge gives them a unique perspective that provides significant operating value.

name: Tanner Bell
description: PCG delivers on what they promise and are true partner in the business. They provide much more than just capital

name: Chris Dunn
description: PCG has been a tremendous partner over the years; their insight and leadership has been very valuable

name: Greg Steltenpohl
description: PCG has been a great partner to Califia Farms and our predecessor companies for many years. We consider PCG good friends in addition to being business partners. Most importantly PCG shares Califia Farms values

name: Mike Pickett
description: PCG allowed Cytosport to grow from a powder business to ready to drink, bars and more, more than tripling the size of our business before our sale to Hormel and later to Pepsi Co.

name: Steve Fafel
description: TBL/PCG understood our values based vision and provided a means for us grow and eventually find the right acquisition partner

name: Jason Bliss
description: PCG was responsible for bringing the capital and focus to our business that allowed HLN to grow throughout the west coast. PCG not only brings capital but a true spirit of partnership
alt: PCG Investment in Healthy Living Network

name: Harold Hochberger
description: The PCG team provided us the opportunity to expand throughout the Northeastern corridor and eventually sell to Planet Organic creating a strong US / CN natural grocer
alt: PCG Investment in Mrs. Green's Natural Market

name: Darren Krissie
description: PCG took the reins in combining our business into a US – CN stronghold in natural and organic grocery, with a strong partnership focus and high values

name: Katie Trent
description: We appreciate PCG’s partnership in supporting Rudy’s growth in retail and products throughout the Northwestern US. They are great partners

name: Robert Brewster
description: PCG has been a great partner to The Alaska Club, allowing us to expand our clubs to provide more services to our members and add new formats in our trampoline park and yoga studio formats
alt: PCG Investment in The Alaska Club

name: Rob Leach
description: PCG was responsible for acquisitions and organic growth that developed GYMVMT from a small Calgary based fitness club to a leader in Western Canada with multiple formats
